document.full_text: shipments of cucumbers and other food grown in spain are being inspected by u.s. health officials because of a deadly e.coli outbreak that has killed 16 people in europe and sickened more than 1,000.
document.title: u.s. eyes spanish produce in deadly e.coli outbreak
lines_and_colors: shipments of cucumbers and other food grown in spain are being inspected by u.s. health officials because of a deadly e.coli outbreak that has killed 16 people in europe and sickened more than 1,000.
